title: Google prepares ‘ChromeOS’ rebrand to drop the space
content:
Google seems to have decided to fully drop the space and rebrand their desktop operating system to “ChromeOS.”

more…

description: Google seems to have decided to fully drop the space and rebrand their desktop operating system to "ChromeOS."
